snippet: A new company called Rail Explorers has attracted thousands of visitors to ride a six-mile stretch of abandoned railroad track, but the state has targeted the railroad for demolition.
abstract: Proposed conversion of stretch of historic abandoned railroad track to multipurpose recreational trail near Saranac Lake, NY,  would force company Rail Explorers, which recently started renting rail bikes for use on tracks, to relocate; plan could boost economic development by attracting more visitors to area, but many say rail bike company is already doing that.
lead_paragraph: A new company called Rail Explorers has attracted thousands of visitors to ride a six-mile stretch of abandoned railroad track, but the state has targeted the railroad for demolition.

headline.main: Rail Biking Arrives in Adirondacks, but Future of Track Is in Doubt
headline.print_headline: New Way to Ride Rails Arrives in Adirondacks, but Now the Tracks May Go
